TopicTitle: Should cheat menu options propagate across saves?

Articles.Content:
I am not a cheater... but having watched Scott Manley's 5xG to orbit challenge, my first task on updating to 1.2 was to create a special game just to try a 10xG orbit... I gave up after I couldn't get anything to not explode on the pad over 8xG... (I love the stress creaking sounds though!)

So I gave up and went back to my normal game. After losing an orbiting probe on a part rescue mission unexplainedly, and nearly my station, I went back in to check the gravity setting - still on 7.something xG?!?!

 

Surely cheat menu options should be set in a particular save game and stored in that game only?

Welcome to the forums!

But you should probably put this in the Suggestions subforum.
I don't think they do, the're not saved at all afaik. They just stay active during that one gaming session.
They aren't store in the persistance file, but IMO, I think they should reset if you exit to the main menu.
